entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 25 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning then snow. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Saturday 1 April 2023
